text: Stater of Olympia used in the 94th Ancient Olympic Games (404 BC) Krokinas of Larissa or Kroukinas (5th-4th century BC) was an Ancient Greek athlete, who won the Stadion (404 BC) and the Diaulos (396 BC) of the 94th and later 96th Olympic Games.Xenophon, Hellenica, 2.3.1Oxyrhynchus Papyri, 2381Mark Golden, Sport in the Ancient World from A to Z, p. 46, Routledge, 1 June 2004http://www.sportolimpico.it/dmdocuments/GO-ANTICHI-2.pdf Gli Olimpionici dell’ antichità, 94 == References == Category:5th-century BC Greek people Category:Ancient Thessalian athletes Category:Ancient Olympic competitors Category:Ancient Thessalians Category:Ancient Greek runners
title: Krokinas of Larissa
